Mediumcube has been proudly providing hosting services since 2001. We're proud to be one of the few companies that continue to provide reliable,
professional hosting services for over a decade. MediumCube is a leading-edge privately held web hosting, IT solutions, and application services company

based in Ottawa, the national capital of Canada.

Receive 50% off your hosting packages when you sign up for any Unix or Windows shared hosting plan. Offer valid until the end of October.

Linux Web Hosting

No other operating system can come close to the speed, reliability, flexibility and the feature list that Linux has. With over 150 different pre-installed

features Linux web hosting is the choice for 8 out of 10 web hosting clients. Streaming audio & video, email accounts, PHP, MySQL, and total account

management using our powerful web-based control panel system are just a few of the many features each Linux web hosting account comes with. For world-class

service and reliability, Mediumcube has mastered the service of Linux web hosting.

Mediumcube has made windows web hosting a giant with wings.
